desc: Goodery is a local, organic grocery store with a commitment to zero waste and zero emissions. Based in Norwich, Norfolk. As a response to COVID-19, we began delivering fruit and veg boxes to NHS staff and key workers. Since then, we've grown our offering to include local organic produce and everyday essentials.

layout.text:
Shop local,
Buy organic,
Eat healthy.
Organic food and everyday essentials delivered fresh from local producers.
